comments.comment:
This is already resolved. In the updated docs, the window size is mentioned correctly. Please check <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/examples/blob/master/courses/udacity_intro_to_tensorflow_for_deep_learning/l08c05_forecasting_with_machine_learning.ipynb>here</denchmark-link> .
First, we will train a model to forecast the next step given the previous 30 steps, therefore, we need to create a dataset of 30-step windows for training.
I am closing this issue as this was already resolved. Thanks!
